definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to let saliva dribble from the mouth/to slobber
to let drip/to trickle down/to shed (tears)

sentences.english: And nobody , knows, so still it flows.
sentences.chinese: 谁，能知道，它在如此寂静地淌着。

sentences.english: He had become very still. Saliva was at the corners of his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸已经一动不动了，嘴角上还淌着口水。

sentences.english: The child is too young to hold a kettle. The water spilled all over the floor.
sentences.chinese: 孩子太小提不动壶，水泼出来淌了一地。

sentences.english: Tears stream down my cheeks, still, I don't stop.
sentences.chinese: 眼泪仍然不断淌下脸颊，我却并未停步。

sentences.english: Now drips the saliva , will become tomorrow tear.
sentences.chinese: 现在淌着的哈喇子，将成为明天的眼泪。

sentences.english: Political hooligans with tanks, missiles and guns!
sentences.chinese: 政治淌氓，坦克，导弹，枪支。

sentences.english: Great drops of perspiration trickled down from his brow.
sentences.chinese: 大颗大颗的汗水从他的额头上淌下来。

sentences.english: To number drop by drop Thy Blood's slow loss.
sentences.chinese: 数着你的血慢慢往下滴淌。

sentences.english: You mean, you go to the piece of guttering Blackwater river to drink it?
sentences.chinese: 你是说，你到那条淌著黑水的河里去喝水了吗？

sentences.english: The perspiration was running down my back.
She cuts its throat, and daubs the blood on her finger tip.
sentences.chinese: 她切开猎物的喉咙，用指尖沾上淌出来的血液。

sentences.english: He was so worried that sweat began to pour down his face.
sentences.chinese: 他是那样着急，汗开始沿着他的面颊淌了下来。

sentences.english: The candle was guttering in the candlestick.
Tears bursting out ran down the sky's dark cheek.
sentences.chinese: 天迸出了泪，淌下它暗淡的脸。

sentences.english: He sank into the chair, and brooded over the embers, and shed tears.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在椅子上，望着火炉的余烬兀自出神，淌着眼泪。

definition: to let drip/to trickle down/to shed (tears)
to overflow/transverse flow/to flow over/cross flow
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
